original_title: Mike Oldfield - Tubular Bells (Live at the BBC 1973)
overview: Live-in-the-studio performance for the BBC, filmed on 30 November 1973, originally broadcast on BBC2 on 1 December, with a cast including Oldfield, his brother Terry (flute), Fred Frith (and other members of Henry Cow), Steve Hillage, Pierre Moerlen, Tom Newman, Mike Ratledge, Mick Taylor, Karl Jenkins and others.
title: Mike Oldfield - Tubular Bells (Live at the BBC 1973)
